title: Second Gentleman Emhoff Ushered Out of Event After Threat to D.C. School
sub_head: Secret Service says there’s no indication threat was directed toward husband of Vice President Kamala Harris
body:
Second gentleman Doug Emhoff, the husband of Vice President Kamala Harris, was ushered out of an event Tuesday at Dunbar High School in Washington, D.C., after a security threat to the school, law-enforcement officials said.
The high school’s front desk received a call with a bomb threat at 2:15 p.m. while Mr. Emhoff was in the building, said Ashan Benedict, executive assistant chief for the Metropolitan Police Department. Mr. Benedict said the caller said people in the building had 10 minutes to leave. The information was passed to Secret Service agents, who evacuated Mr. Emhoff minutes later.
